overview: Engaged nightclub singer Rose Indrasari (Nena Rosier) is brutally gang raped and then abandoned by her fiance, prompting her to attempt suicide. The man who saves her life then forces her to become a sex slave and she contracts an unpleasant v.d. called Vietnam Rose. Having finally had enough by that point, she decides to get revenge on the men who ruined her life.
title: Poisonous Rose
